name: ANTonomy
description: ANTonomy is a simulation game of the management of a city, where the player must make decisions based on the available resources. The objective is to make sure that the balance within the nest is ensured. There are various aspects that must be taken into account, the happiness of the ants, the health of the ants, the coexistence of the ants. Thanks to the resources that are collected during the game, the player can buy the various expansions to make sure that all three parameters can be managed in the best possible way.
